Package org.moeaframework.util

package org.moeaframework.util
Collection of general-purpose utilities.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.moeaframework
    Convenience classes for using the MOEA Framework.
    org.moeaframework.util.distributed
    Classes to enable distributed computing.
    org.moeaframework.util.grammar
    Utilities for representing, parsing and building grammars for use in Grammatical Evolution (GE).
    org.moeaframework.util.io
    Collection of I/O utility classes.
    org.moeaframework.util.progress
    Collection of classes for managing progress reporting, including providing listeners for receiving progress updates and estimating remaining time.
    org.moeaframework.util.sequence
    Classes for generating sequences of real numbers.
    org.moeaframework.util.statistics
    Collection of statistical methods for determining certain properties of collected samples.
    org.moeaframework.util.tree
    Classes for representing, building and evaluating expression trees for use in Genetic Programming (GP).
    org.moeaframework.util.weights
    Routines for generating weights for decomposition and reference point methods.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommandLineUtility
    Abstract class for providing command line utilities.
    Localization
    Facilitates internalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) of strings.
    OptionCompleter
    Utility for auto-completion, finding the closest matching unique option from a set of options.
    ReferenceSetMerger
    Utility for merging two or more populations identified by unique sources and determining the contribution of each source to the combined non-dominated population.
    RotationMatrixBuilder
    Builds rotation matrices of any dimension constructively from one or more 2D planar rotations.
    SolutionUtils
    Utility methods for solutions.
    Timing
    Tool to simplify manually collecting timing information.
    TypedProperties
    Wrapper for Properties providing getters for reading specific primitive types.
    Vector
    Mathematical operators for manipulating vectors (double arrays).
